00049 /* ****************** Start/End Frame Operators *******************************/
00050 static int time_set_sfra_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00051 {
00052     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00053     int frame;
00054 
00055     if (scene == NULL)
00056         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00057 
00058     frame= CFRA;
00059 
00060     /* if Preview Range is defined, set the 'start' frame for that */
00061     if (PRVRANGEON)
00062         scene->r.psfra= frame;
00063     else
00064         scene->r.sfra= frame;
00065     
00066     if (PEFRA < frame) {
00067         if (PRVRANGEON)
00068             scene->r.pefra= frame;
00069         else
00070             scene->r.efra= frame;
00071     }
00072     
00073     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00074     
00075     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static void TIME_OT_start_frame_set (wmOperatorType *ot)
00079 {
00080     /* identifiers */
00081     ot->name = "Set Start Frame";
00082     ot->idname = "TIME_OT_start_frame_set";
00083     ot->description = "Set the start frame";
00084     
00085     /* api callbacks */
00086     ot->exec = time_set_sfra_exec;
00087     ot->poll = ED_operator_timeline_active;
00088     
00089     /* flags */
00090     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00091 }   
00092 
00093 
00094 static int time_set_efra_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00095 {
00096     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00097     int frame;
00098 
00099     if (scene == NULL)
00100         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00101 
00102     frame= CFRA;
00103 
00104     /* if Preview Range is defined, set the 'end' frame for that */
00105     if (PRVRANGEON)
00106         scene->r.pefra= frame;
00107     else
00108         scene->r.efra= frame;
00109 
00110     if (PSFRA > frame) {
00111         if (PRVRANGEON)
00112             scene->r.psfra= frame;
00113         else
00114             scene->r.sfra= frame;
00115     }
00116     
00117     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00118     
00119     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static void TIME_OT_end_frame_set (wmOperatorType *ot)
00123 {
00124     /* identifiers */
00125     ot->name = "Set End Frame";
00126     ot->idname = "TIME_OT_end_frame_set";
00127     ot->description = "Set the end frame";
00128     
00129     /* api callbacks */
00130     ot->exec = time_set_efra_exec;
00131     ot->poll = ED_operator_timeline_active;
00132     
00133     /* flags */
00134     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00135 }
00136 
00137 /* ************************ View All Operator *******************************/
00138 
00139 static int time_view_all_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00140 {
00141     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00142     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00143     View2D *v2d= (ar) ? &ar->v2d : NULL;
00144     float extra;
00145     
00146     if (ELEM(NULL, scene, ar))
00147         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00148         
00149     /* set extents of view to start/end frames (Preview Range too) */
00150     v2d->cur.xmin = (float)PSFRA;
00151     v2d->cur.xmax = (float)PEFRA;
00152     
00153     /* we need an extra "buffer" factor on either side so that the endpoints are visible */
00154     extra= 0.01f * (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin);
00155     v2d->cur.xmin -= extra;
00156     v2d->cur.xmax += extra;
00157     
00158     /* this only affects this TimeLine instance, so just force redraw of this region */
00159     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00160     
00161     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00162 }
00163 
00164 static void TIME_OT_view_all (wmOperatorType *ot)
00165 {
00166     /* identifiers */
00167     ot->name = "View All";
00168     ot->idname = "TIME_OT_view_all";
00169     ot->description = "Show the entire playable frame range";
00170     
00171     /* api callbacks */
00172     ot->exec = time_view_all_exec;
00173     ot->poll = ED_operator_timeline_active;
00174     
00175     /* flags */
00176     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00177 }

00179 /* ************************** registration **********************************/
00180 
00181 void time_operatortypes(void)
00182 {
00183     WM_operatortype_append(TIME_OT_start_frame_set);
00184     WM_operatortype_append(TIME_OT_end_frame_set);
00185     WM_operatortype_append(TIME_OT_view_all);
00186 }
00187 
00188 void time_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00189 {
00190     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Timeline", SPACE_TIME, 0);
00191     
00192     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "TIME_OT_start_frame_set", SKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00193     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "TIME_OT_end_frame_set", EKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00194     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "TIME_OT_view_all", HOMEKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00195 }
